name: Arrow
description:
Arrows used with small and long bows. 
Unremarkable in any way, shape or form.

name: Ballista Bolt
description: Great Bolt as large as a spear for use with Hand Ballista

name: Black-Key Bolt
description: Bolts used in Crepus' Black-Key Crossbow, an assassin's tool of exquisite craftmanship.

name: Bloodbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. 
Afflicts targets with blood loss.

name: Bloodbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. 
Afflicts targets with blood loss.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Bloodbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. 
Afflicts targets with blood loss.

name: Bolt
description:
Ammunition used for crossbows. 
A widespread, common type of bolt.

name: Bone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. 
Though the arrowhead is sharp indeed, it doesn't fly particularly true.

name: Bone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Bone Ballista Bolt
description:
Great Bolt as large as a spear carved from stout animal bones.
Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

name: Bone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from a thin animal bone.
Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

name: Bone Great Arrow
description: Thick, whittled animal bone arrow, large as a spear.

name: Bone Great Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Great Arrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Burred Bolt
description:
Bolt covered in thorns. 
One of the most horrific weapons used in the Shattering. 
Afflicts with blood loss.

name: Coldbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost.

name: Coldbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Coldbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost.

name: Dwelling Arrow
description:
Arrow in which the spirits of small animals are thought to dwell.
Deals magic damage.

name: Explosive Bolt
description:
Bolt tipped with a shard of Explosive Stone. 
Explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

name: Explosive Great Bolt
description:
Great Bolt tipped with a clump of Explosive Stone shards.
Detonates a large explosion on impact, dealing fire damage.

name: Fire Arrow
description:
Arrow with the tip set alight. 
Deals fire damage.

name: Firebone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is set alight before firing. 
Deals Fire Damage to foes.

name: Firebone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is set alight before firing. 
Deals Fire Damage to foes.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Firebone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is set alight before firing. 
Deals Fire Damage.

name: Flaming Bolt
description:
Bolt with a fiercely burned tip. 
Deals powerful Fire Damage.

name: Golden Arrow
description:
Carved arrows made in tandem with the Erdtree Bow. 
Deals Holy Damage.

name: Golden Bolt
description:
Bolt blessed with an incantation of the Erdtree. 
Deals powerful Holy damage.

name: Golden Great Arrow
description:
Carved Great Arrows made together with the Erdtree Greatbow. 
Deals Holy damage.

name: Golem's Great Arrow
description:
Great Arrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. 
Used by the Guardian Golem.
This hefty arrow is enrobed in tempestuous winds, allowing it to break enemy stances and guards with ease.

name: Golem's Magic Arrow
description:
Great Arrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. 
Imbued with its ancient magic.

name: Great Arrow
description:
A Great Arrow as large as a spear for use with greatbows. 
Used by archers of monstrous strength employed by a lord's army.

name: Haligbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled From animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. 
Deals holy damage.

name: Haligbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. 
Deals holy damage.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Haligbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. 
Deals holy damage.

name: Lightning Bolt
description:
Bolt Bolt tipped with a shard of Gravel Stone. 
Deals powerful lightning damage.
Used by worshippers of the ancient dragons.

name: Lightning Greatbolt
description:
Great Bolt tipped with a clump of Gravel Stone shards. 
Deals powerful lightning damage.

name: Lightningbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. 
Deals lightning damage.

name: Lightningbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. 
Deals lightning damage.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Lightningbone Bolt
description:
Bolt crafted from animal bone with a lightning-infused tip. 
Deals lightning damage.

name: Lordsworn's Bolt
description:
Well-crafted bolt with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.
Deals more damage by its commonplace cousin.

name: Magicbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. 
Deals magic damage.

name: Magicbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. 
Deals magic damage.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Magicbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. 
Deals magic damage.

name: Meteor Bolt
description:
Enchanted work of craft made in tandem with Full Moon Crossbow. 
The tip is embedded with glintstone.
Like a shooting star, these bolts leave a beautiful trail when fired. 
Deals magic damage.

name: Perfumer's Bolt
description: The point of impact explodes with sparks, dealing fire damage.

name: Poisonbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with venom. 
Afflicts targets with Poison.

name: Poisonbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with venom. 
Afflicts targets with Poison. 
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Poisonbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is daubed with venom. 
Afflicts targets with poison.

name: Radahn's Spear
description: Imbued with Radahn's gravitational power.

name: Rainbow Stone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. 
Colored lights shine at the point of impact.

name: Rainbow Stone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. 
Colored light shines at the point of impact.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Rotbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with rot. 
Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

name: Rotbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with rot. 
Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Rotbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets 
with scarlet rot.

name: Serpent Arrow
description:
Arrow carved to resemble a flying snake. 
Used in tandem with the Serpent Bow.
Loyal minions of the Formless Serpents, their fangs are daubed with deadly poison.

name: Shattershard Arrow
description:
Arrows whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. 
Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

name: Shattershard Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrows whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. 
Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Sleepbone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with drowsiness.

name: Sleepbone Arrow (Fletched)
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with drowsiness.
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Sleepbone Bolt
description:
Bolt carved from animal bone. 
The tip is daubed with a waterlily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with sleep.

name: Spiritflame Arrow
description:
Arrow set alight with ghostflame before firing. 
Deals magic damage while also afflicting foes with frost.

name: Stormwing Bone Arrow
description:
Arrow whittled from animal bones fletched with stormhawk feathers.
Flies enshrouded in storm winds, breaking enemy stances and guards with ease.

name: Trina's Arrow
description:
Arrow carved to resemble a withered water lily. 
Afflicts targets with a powerful soporific effect. 
Once served an exclusively ritual use by the priests of St.Trina. 
The peace of deepest slumber can be so very hard to resist.
